Blackjack, huh?

Well I hope you’re good at counting, otherwise you’re gonna have a bad time. The aim of the game is to get a higher point total than the dealer, without going over 21.

I bet I just said a lot of words that don’t quite make sense, right? Don’t worry, I’ll explain some of those key terms now!

let’s start off with the dealer.

Blackjack is a game that can be played with multiple people, but for the purposes of teaching the game, it’ll just be you and the dealer!

The Dealer

So who is this dealer I keep mentioning? The dealer is the person who holds all of the cards at the beginning of the game, shuffles them and gives all of the players their starting cards.

Once the dealer is done ‘dealing’ enough cards, they then become your opponent!

Let’s do it together.
